title: Rare Dev & Governance Day 2025
description: Get ready to kick off Rare Evo 2025 with Rare Dev & Governance Day — a full day dedicated to builders, developers, and innovators in the blockchain space.

title: Blockchain Rio
description: Get ready to experience the ultimate immersion into the blockchain universe! Lectures by big names in the sector, high-level networking and unique experiences await you at Blockchain.Rio 2025.

title: TOKEN 2049
description: A major annual crypto conference that brings together founders, investors, developers, policymakers, and industry leaders to discuss trends, products, and innovations in the blockchain space.

title: Cardano Summit 2025
description: This November, the Cardano Summit arrives in Berlin, connecting the vibrant Cardano ecosystem with leading global enterprises.

title: India Blockchain Week Bangalore
description: Regional Cardano event during India Blockchain Week. The India Blockchain Week (IBW) is India's premier series of blockchain and web3 events, held from December 1-7, 2025.

title: Azteca 2025 - Mexico Cardano Community Events
description: Azteca 2025 brought together 400+ Cardano enthusiasts across two days, with talks, panels, workshops, and community activities—showcasing Latin America’s growing role in Cardano.
organizer: Cardano Mexico and Latam Cardano Community

title: Berlin Hackathon 2025
description: Cardano Hackathon Berlin 2025, June 13–14, hosted by NMKR & Masumi at w3.hub, was a two-day mix of coding, collaboration & real talk, focused on building real tools for real users on Cardano.

title: Bangalore Tech Summit 2025
description: Asia’s largest technology event, featuring 1,200 exhibitors, over 100,000 attendees, keynote sessions, and the theme “Futurise.” Focus areas include AI, DeepTech, Biotech, SpaceTech. Designed for global entrepreneurs, startups, investors, and policymakers.
location: Bangalore International Exhibition Centre, Bengaluru, India
organizer: Department of Electronics, IT & Biotechnology, Government of Karnataka

title: GITEX Africa Morocco 2026
description: Africa’s biggest tech event with 1400+ exhibitors from 130+ countries. Focus on AI, fintech, smart cities, cybersecurity, health tech, and digital transformation.

title: Blockchain Life Dubai 2025
description: One of the world’s largest Web3 and crypto forums, celebrating its 15th edition. 15,000+ participants, 200+ speakers, and a large expo zone for digital assets, mining, and blockchain leadership.

title: GITEX Global Dubai 2025
description: The world’s largest tech and startup event, 5000+ exhibitors from 170 countries. Key topics: AI, cloud, cybersecurity, IoT, and blockchain.
organizer: Dubai World Trade Centre / KAOUN International

title: Tech4Impact Summit 2025
description: Event on technology for social and environmental impact. Attracts investors, startups, and purpose-driven organizations.

title: Philippines Blockchain Week 2025
description: Week-long event themed “Decoded,” emphasizing FinTech, Healthcare, Gaming, Music, and Filipino Web3 innovation. Includes international speakers and cultural experiences.
